title: GET members
description: Returns list of all parliament members.

params.name: limit
params.desc: Specifies maximum number of members to return in a single request.

params.name: page
params.desc: Used for result pagination; specifies a page to be returned. It should be combined with a number of parliament members returned on the page is specified by the limit parameter.

params.name: sort
params.desc: Used for sorting the result; specifies order of a result to be returned. Possible values are ASC for ascending and DESC for descending order.
